tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InmateRecords (
  inmate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inmate_name VARCHAR(255),
  admission_date DATE,
  release_date DATE,
  rehabilitation_progress INT
);

CREATE TABLE inmate_records (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 inmate_id INT NOT NULL,
 inmate_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 entry_date TIMESTAMP,
 release_date TIMESTAMP,
 rehabilitation_progress VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE rehabilitation_progress (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 inmate_id INT,
 progress_date TIMESTAMP,
 progress_details VARCHAR(255),
 CONSTRAINT fk_inmate_id
    FOREIGN KEY (inmate_id)
    REFERENCES inmate_records (inmate_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Inmates (
    inmate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    sentence_start_date DATE,
    sentence_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inmates (
    inmate_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    sentence VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inmate_progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    inmate_id INT,
    program_id INT,
    progress_status VARCHAR(50),
    progress_notes TEXT,
    progress_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inmates (
    inmate_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    release_date DATE,
    sentence_length INT,
    notes TEXT
);
